1010111111100110 0110011010101000 1 -> sum: 0001011010001111, cout: 1
1001101000101010 0111101000110010 0 -> sum: 0001010001011100, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
